description:
WordPress Content Management System (CMS) is the #1 website builder available on the internet and it is use by more than 85 million entrepreneurs and businesses worldwide.

This course is an in-depth look at some other WordPress's features and functionality. It teaches you from scratch how to create a customized website hosted on your own computer.

This course also shows step by step how to successfully migrate website from Localhost to an online Web Server, and creating a fully functional responsive website using WordPress themes.

It is about WordPress Development and in this course I will guide you step by step by means of hands-on tutorials on how to develop a WordPress website on your LocalHost and then I will teach you how to migrate your website from your LocalHost to a Web Server.

This course is approximately 1.5 hours long and within this time period you will become an expert at WordPress Development. If you are interested in learning the fundamental concepts of WordPress then this course is for you. So why wait? Enroll Now and become an expert at WordPress Development.
title: WordPress Development Crash Course: From Zero To Hero
